9. CRUD 구현

웹 애플리케이션의 핵심 기능인 CRUD(Create, Read, Update, Delete) 작업을 완전히 구현하는 방법을 학습합니다. 실무에서 바로 활용 가능한 패턴과 최적화 기법을 다룹니다.

9.1 CRUD 개념​

CRUD는 데이터베이스와 상호작용하는 4가지 기본 작업을 의미합니다.

9.1.1 CRUD 작업 개요​

작업HTTP 메서드SQL설명
CreatePOSTINSERT새로운 데이터 생성
ReadGETSELECT데이터 조회 (단일/목록)
UpdatePUT/PATCHUPDATE기존 데이터 수정
DeleteDELETEDELETE데이터 삭제

9.1.2 RESTful API 설계​

// API 엔드포인트 구조
const API_ROUTES = {
  // 목록 조회 및 생성
  posts: '/api/posts',           // GET, POST

  // 단일 리소스 조회, 수정, 삭제
  post: '/api/posts/:id',        // GET, PUT, DELETE

  // 검색 및 필터링
  search: '/api/posts?q=keyword&page=1&limit=10',
};
RESTful 설계 원칙
  • 명사 사용: 리소스는 명사로 표현 (/posts, /users)
  • 복수형: 컬렉션은 복수형 사용
  • 계층 구조: 관계를 URL로 표현 (/posts/:id/comments)
  • 쿼리 파라미터: 필터링, 정렬, 페이지네이션

9.2 Backend: Create 작업 구현​

9.2.1 Express API 구현​

// backend/src/routes/posts.ts
import express, { Request, Response } from 'express';
import { body, validationResult } from 'express-validator';
import { Post } from '../models/Post';
import { AppError } from '../middleware/errorHandler';

const router = express.Router();

// 유효성 검사 규칙
const createPostValidation = [
  body('title')
    .trim()
    .notEmpty().withMessage('제목은 필수입니다')
    .isLength({ min: 3, max: 100 }).withMessage('제목은 3-100자여야 합니다'),
  body('content')
    .trim()
    .notEmpty().withMessage('내용은 필수입니다')
    .isLength({ min: 10 }).withMessage('내용은 최소 10자 이상이어야 합니다'),
  body('author')
    .trim()
    .notEmpty().withMessage('작성자는 필수입니다'),
  body('tags')
    .optional()
    .isArray().withMessage('태그는 배열이어야 합니다'),
];

// POST /api/posts - 게시글 생성
router.post('/', createPostValidation, async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    // 유효성 검사 결과 확인
    const errors = validationResult(req);
    if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효성 검사 실패', errors.array());
    }

    const { title, content, author, tags } = req.body;

    // 게시글 생성
    const post = await Post.create({
      title,
      content,
      author,
      tags: tags || [],
      createdAt: new Date(),
      updatedAt: new Date(),
      published: false,
    });

    // 201 Created 응답
    res.status(201).json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 생성되었습니다',
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

export default router;

9.2.2 데이터 모델 (Mongoose)​

// backend/src/models/Post.ts
import mongoose, { Document, Schema } from 'mongoose';

export interface IPost extends Document {
  title: string;
  content: string;
  author: string;
  tags: string[];
  published: boolean;
  createdAt: Date;
  updatedAt: Date;
}

const PostSchema = new Schema<IPost>(
  {
    title: {
      type: String,
      required: [true, '제목은 필수입니다'],
      trim: true,
      minlength: [3, '제목은 최소 3자 이상이어야 합니다'],
      maxlength: [100, '제목은 최대 100자까지 가능합니다'],
    },
    content: {
      type: String,
      required: [true, '내용은 필수입니다'],
      minlength: [10, '내용은 최소 10자 이상이어야 합니다'],
    },
    author: {
      type: String,
      required: [true, '작성자는 필수입니다'],
      trim: true,
    },
    tags: {
      type: [String],
      default: [],
    },
    published: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
  },
  {
    timestamps: true, // createdAt, updatedAt 자동 생성
  }
);

// 인덱스 설정 (검색 성능 향상)
PostSchema.index({ title: 'text', content: 'text' });
PostSchema.index({ createdAt: -1 });

export const Post = mongoose.model<IPost>('Post', PostSchema);

9.2.3 에러 처리 미들웨어​

// backend/src/middleware/errorHandler.ts
import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';

export class AppError extends Error {
  statusCode: number;
  details?: any;

  constructor(statusCode: number, message: string, details?: any) {
    super(message);
    this.statusCode = statusCode;
    this.details = details;
    Error.captureStackTrace(this, this.constructor);
  }
}

export const errorHandler = (
  err: Error | AppError,
  req: Request,
  res: Response,
  next: NextFunction
) => {
  if (err instanceof AppError) {
    return res.status(err.statusCode).json({
      success: false,
      message: err.message,
      details: err.details,
    });
  }

  // 예상치 못한 에러
  console.error('Unexpected error:', err);
  res.status(500).json({
    success: false,
    message: '서버 오류가 발생했습니다',
  });
};

9.3 Backend: Read 작업 구현 (단일, 목록)​

9.3.1 목록 조회 (페이지네이션, 필터링)​

// GET /api/posts - 게시글 목록 조회
router.get('/', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    // 쿼리 파라미터 파싱
    const page = parseInt(req.query.page as string) || 1;
    const limit = parseInt(req.query.limit as string) || 10;
    const search = req.query.search as string || '';
    const tag = req.query.tag as string || '';
    const published = req.query.published as string;

    // 필터 조건 구성
    const filter: any = {};

    if (search) {
      filter.$text = { $search: search };
    }

    if (tag) {
      filter.tags = tag;
    }

    if (published !== undefined) {
      filter.published = published === 'true';
    }

    // 총 개수 조회
    const total = await Post.countDocuments(filter);

    // 페이지네이션 적용 조회
    const posts = await Post.find(filter)
      .sort({ createdAt: -1 })
      .skip((page - 1) * limit)
      .limit(limit)
      .select('-__v'); // __v 필드 제외

    // 페이지네이션 메타데이터
    const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / limit);

    res.json({
      success: true,
      data: posts,
      pagination: {
        page,
        limit,
        total,
        totalPages,
        hasNextPage: page < totalPages,
        hasPrevPage: page > 1,
      },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.3.2 단일 조회​

// GET /api/posts/:id - 게시글 상세 조회
router.get('/:id', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    // MongoDB ObjectId 유효성 검사
    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 게시글 ID입니다');
    }

    const post = await Post.findById(id);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({
      success: true,
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.3.3 고급 쿼리 (정렬, 필드 선택)​

// GET /api/posts/advanced - 고급 쿼리
router.get('/advanced/search', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const {
      page = 1,
      limit = 10,
      sort = '-createdAt',
      fields = '',
      ...filterParams
    } = req.query;

    // 동적 필터 구성
    const filter: any = {};

    // 날짜 범위 필터
    if (filterParams.startDate || filterParams.endDate) {
      filter.createdAt = {};
      if (filterParams.startDate) {
        filter.createdAt.$gte = new Date(filterParams.startDate as string);
      }
      if (filterParams.endDate) {
        filter.createdAt.$lte = new Date(filterParams.endDate as string);
      }
    }

    // 쿼리 빌더
    let query = Post.find(filter);

    // 정렬 적용
    if (sort) {
      const sortBy = (sort as string).split(',').join(' ');
      query = query.sort(sortBy);
    }

    // 필드 선택
    if (fields) {
      const selectFields = (fields as string).split(',').join(' ');
      query = query.select(selectFields);
    }

    // 페이지네이션
    const skip = (Number(page) - 1) * Number(limit);
    query = query.skip(skip).limit(Number(limit));

    // 실행
    const [posts, total] = await Promise.all([
      query.exec(),
      Post.countDocuments(filter),
    ]);

    res.json({
      success: true,
      data: posts,
      pagination: {
        page: Number(page),
        limit: Number(limit),
        total,
        totalPages: Math.ceil(total / Number(limit)),
      },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.4 Backend: Update 작업 구현​

9.4.1 전체 수정 (PUT)​

// PUT /api/posts/:id - 게시글 전체 수정
router.put(
  '/:id',
  createPostValidation,
  async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
    try {
      const { id } = req.params;

      if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
        throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 게시글 ID입니다');
      }

      const errors = validationResult(req);
      if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
        throw new AppError(400, '유효성 검사 실패', errors.array());
      }

      const { title, content, author, tags, published } = req.body;

      // findByIdAndUpdate: 수정 후 새 문서 반환
      const post = await Post.findByIdAndUpdate(
        id,
        {
          title,
          content,
          author,
          tags: tags || [],
          published: published || false,
          updatedAt: new Date(),
        },
        {
          new: true,        // 수정된 문서 반환
          runValidators: true, // 스키마 유효성 검사 실행
        }
      );

      if (!post) {
        throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
      }

      res.json({
        success: true,
        message: '게시글이 수정되었습니다',
        data: post,
      });
    } catch (error) {
      throw error;
    }
  }
);

9.4.2 부분 수정 (PATCH)​

// PATCH /api/posts/:id - 게시글 부분 수정
router.patch('/:id', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 게시글 ID입니다');
    }

    // 허용된 필드만 추출
    const allowedUpdates = ['title', 'content', 'tags', 'published'];
    const updates: any = {};

    Object.keys(req.body).forEach((key) => {
      if (allowedUpdates.includes(key)) {
        updates[key] = req.body[key];
      }
    });

    if (Object.keys(updates).length === 0) {
      throw new AppError(400, '수정할 필드가 없습니다');
    }

    updates.updatedAt = new Date();

    const post = await Post.findByIdAndUpdate(
      id,
      { $set: updates },
      { new: true, runValidators: true }
    );

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 수정되었습니다',
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.4.3 트랜잭션을 사용한 안전한 업데이트​

// PATCH /api/posts/:id/publish - 게시글 발행 (트랜잭션)
router.patch('/:id/publish', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  const session = await mongoose.startSession();
  session.startTransaction();

  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    const post = await Post.findById(id).session(session);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    if (post.published) {
      throw new AppError(400, '이미 발행된 게시글입니다');
    }

    // 게시글 발행
    post.published = true;
    post.updatedAt = new Date();
    await post.save({ session });

    // 다른 관련 작업 (예: 알림 생성)
    // await Notification.create([{ ... }], { session });

    // 트랜잭션 커밋
    await session.commitTransaction();

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 발행되었습니다',
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    // 트랜잭션 롤백
    await session.abortTransaction();
    throw error;
  } finally {
    session.endSession();
  }
});

9.5 Backend: Delete 작업 구현​

9.5.1 단일 삭제​

// DELETE /api/posts/:id - 게시글 삭제
router.delete('/:id', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 게시글 ID입니다');
    }

    const post = await Post.findByIdAndDelete(id);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 삭제되었습니다',
      data: { id },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.5.2 소프트 삭제 (Soft Delete)​

// 스키마에 deletedAt 필드 추가
const PostSchema = new Schema<IPost>(
  {
    // ... 기존 필드들
    deletedAt: {
      type: Date,
      default: null,
    },
  },
  { timestamps: true }
);

// 소프트 삭제 메서드
PostSchema.methods.softDelete = function() {
  this.deletedAt = new Date();
  return this.save();
};

// 삭제되지 않은 게시글만 조회하는 쿼리 헬퍼
PostSchema.query.notDeleted = function() {
  return this.where({ deletedAt: null });
};

// DELETE /api/posts/:id/soft - 소프트 삭제
router.delete('/:id/soft', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    const post = await Post.findById(id);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    if (post.deletedAt) {
      throw new AppError(400, '이미 삭제된 게시글입니다');
    }

    await (post as any).softDelete();

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 삭제되었습니다',
      data: { id },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

// 목록 조회 시 삭제된 게시글 제외
router.get('/', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  const posts = await Post.find().notDeleted().sort({ createdAt: -1 });
  // ...
});

9.5.3 일괄 삭제​

// DELETE /api/posts/bulk - 일괄 삭제
router.delete('/bulk/delete', async (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  try {
    const { ids } = req.body;

    if (!Array.isArray(ids) || ids.length === 0) {
      throw new AppError(400, '삭제할 게시글 ID 배열이 필요합니다');
    }

    // 유효성 검사
    const invalidIds = ids.filter(id => !mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id));
    if (invalidIds.length > 0) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 ID가 포함되어 있습니다');
    }

    const result = await Post.deleteMany({
      _id: { $in: ids }
    });

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: `${result.deletedCount}개의 게시글이 삭제되었습니다`,
      data: {
        deletedCount: result.deletedCount,
      },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

9.6 Frontend: 목록 페이지 (리스트, 테이블)​

9.6.1 데이터 타입 정의​

// frontend/src/types/post.ts
export interface Post {
  _id: string;
  title: string;
  content: string;
  author: string;
  tags: string[];
  published: boolean;
  createdAt: string;
  updatedAt: string;
}

export interface PaginationMeta {
  page: number;
  limit: number;
  total: number;
  totalPages: number;
  hasNextPage: boolean;
  hasPrevPage: boolean;
}

export interface PostListResponse {
  success: boolean;
  data: Post[];
  pagination: PaginationMeta;
}

export interface PostFilters {
  search?: string;
  tag?: string;
  published?: boolean;
  page?: number;
  limit?: number;
}

9.6.2 API 클라이언트​

// frontend/src/api/posts.ts
import axios from 'axios';
import { Post, PostListResponse, PostFilters } from '../types/post';

const API_BASE_URL = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:3000';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

export const postsAPI = {
  // 목록 조회
  getAll: async (filters?: PostFilters): Promise<PostListResponse> => {
    const response = await api.get('/api/posts', { params: filters });
    return response.data;
  },

  // 단일 조회
  getById: async (id: string): Promise<Post> => {
    const response = await api.get(`/api/posts/${id}`);
    return response.data.data;
  },

  // 생성
  create: async (data: Partial<Post>): Promise<Post> => {
    const response = await api.post('/api/posts', data);
    return response.data.data;
  },

  // 수정
  update: async (id: string, data: Partial<Post>): Promise<Post> => {
    const response = await api.put(`/api/posts/${id}`, data);
    return response.data.data;
  },

  // 부분 수정
  patch: async (id: string, data: Partial<Post>): Promise<Post> => {
    const response = await api.patch(`/api/posts/${id}`, data);
    return response.data.data;
  },

  // 삭제
  delete: async (id: string): Promise<void> => {
    await api.delete(`/api/posts/${id}`);
  },

  // 일괄 삭제
  bulkDelete: async (ids: string[]): Promise<void> => {
    await api.delete('/api/posts/bulk/delete', { data: { ids } });
  },
};

9.6.3 React Query를 사용한 데이터 페칭​

// frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts
import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import { postsAPI } from '../api/posts';
import { PostFilters, Post } from '../types/post';
import { toast } from 'react-hot-toast';

// 목록 조회
export const usePosts = (filters?: PostFilters) => {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: ['posts', filters],
    queryFn: () => postsAPI.getAll(filters),
    staleTime: 30000, // 30초
    gcTime: 300000, // 5분
  });
};

// 단일 조회
export const usePost = (id: string) => {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: ['posts', id],
    queryFn: () => postsAPI.getById(id),
    enabled: !!id,
  });
};

// 생성
export const useCreatePost = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: postsAPI.create,
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      toast.success('게시글이 생성되었습니다');
    },
    onError: (error: any) => {
      toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || '생성 중 오류가 발생했습니다');
    },
  });
};

// 수정
export const useUpdatePost = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: ({ id, data }: { id: string; data: Partial<Post> }) =>
      postsAPI.update(id, data),
    onSuccess: (_, variables) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts', variables.id] });
      toast.success('게시글이 수정되었습니다');
    },
    onError: (error: any) => {
      toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || '수정 중 오류가 발생했습니다');
    },
  });
};

// 삭제
export const useDeletePost = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: postsAPI.delete,
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      toast.success('게시글이 삭제되었습니다');
    },
    onError: (error: any) => {
      toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || '삭제 중 오류가 발생했습니다');
    },
  });
};

9.6.4 목록 컴포넌트 (테이블)​

// frontend/src/components/PostTable.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Post } from '../types/post';
import { formatDistanceToNow } from 'date-fns';
import { ko } from 'date-fns/locale';

interface PostTableProps {
  posts: Post[];
  onEdit: (post: Post) => void;
  onDelete: (id: string) => void;
  onSelect?: (ids: string[]) => void;
}

export const PostTable: React.FC<PostTableProps> = ({
  posts,
  onEdit,
  onDelete,
  onSelect,
}) => {
  const [selectedIds, setSelectedIds] = useState<string[]>([]);

  const handleSelectAll = (checked: boolean) => {
    if (checked) {
      const allIds = posts.map(post => post._id);
      setSelectedIds(allIds);
      onSelect?.(allIds);
    } else {
      setSelectedIds([]);
      onSelect?.([]);
    }
  };

  const handleSelectOne = (id: string, checked: boolean) => {
    let newSelected: string[];
    if (checked) {
      newSelected = [...selectedIds, id];
    } else {
      newSelected = selectedIds.filter(selectedId => selectedId !== id);
    }
    setSelectedIds(newSelected);
    onSelect?.(newSelected);
  };

  return (
    <div className="overflow-x-auto">
      <table className="min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200">
        <thead className="bg-gray-50">
          <tr>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left">
              <input
                type="checkbox"
                checked={selectedIds.length === posts.length && posts.length > 0}
                onChange={(e) => handleSelectAll(e.target.checked)}
                className="rounded border-gray-300 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500"
              />
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              제목
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              작성자
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              태그
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              상태
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              생성일
            </th>
            <th className="px-6 py-3 text-right text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
              작업
            </th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
          {posts.map((post) => (
            <tr key={post._id} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
              <td className="px-6 py-4">
                <input
                  type="checkbox"
                  checked={selectedIds.includes(post._id)}
                  onChange={(e) => handleSelectOne(post._id, e.target.checked)}
                  className="rounded border-gray-300 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500"
                />
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
                  {post.title}
                </div>
                <div className="text-sm text-gray-500 line-clamp-1">
                  {post.content}
                </div>
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-900">
                {post.author}
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4">
                <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1">
                  {post.tags.slice(0, 3).map((tag, index) => (
                    <span
                      key={index}
                      className="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-blue-100 text-blue-800"
                    >
                      {tag}
                    </span>
                  ))}
                  {post.tags.length > 3 && (
                    <span className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                      +{post.tags.length - 3}
                    </span>
                  )}
                </div>
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                <span
                  className={`inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ${
                    post.published
                      ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'
                      : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'
                  }`}
                >
                  {post.published ? '발행됨' : '임시저장'}
                </span>
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">
                {formatDistanceToNow(new Date(post.createdAt), {
                  addSuffix: true,
                  locale: ko,
                })}
              </td>
              <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-right text-sm font-medium">
                <button
                  onClick={() => onEdit(post)}
                  className="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-900 mr-4"
                >
                  수정
                </button>
                <button
                  onClick={() => onDelete(post._id)}
                  className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-900"
                >
                  삭제
                </button>
              </td>
            </tr>
          ))}
        </tbody>
      </table>
    </div>
  );
};

9.6.5 카드형 리스트​

// frontend/src/components/PostCards.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Post } from '../types/post';
import { formatDistanceToNow } from 'date-fns';
import { ko } from 'date-fns/locale';

interface PostCardsProps {
  posts: Post[];
  onEdit: (post: Post) => void;
  onDelete: (id: string) => void;
}

export const PostCards: React.FC<PostCardsProps> = ({
  posts,
  onEdit,
  onDelete,
}) => {
  return (
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
      {posts.map((post) => (
        <div
          key={post._id}
          className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md overflow-hidden hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow"
        >
          <div className="p-6">
            {/* 헤더 */}
            <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-4">

              </h3>

                    : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'
                }`}
              >
                {post.published ? '발행' : '임시'}
              </span>
            </div>

            {/* 내용 */}
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 line-clamp-3 mb-4">
              {post.content}
            </p>

                  </span>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}

            {/* 메타 정보 */}

              <span>{post.author}</span>
              <span>
                {formatDistanceToNow(new Date(post.createdAt), {
                  addSuffix: true,
                  locale: ko,
                })}
              </span>
            </div>

            {/* 액션 버튼 */}
            <div className="flex gap-2">
              <button
                onClick={() => onEdit(post)}
                className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors"
              >
                수정
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => onDelete(post._id)}
                className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-red-700 transition-colors"
              >
                삭제
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
};

9.7 Frontend: 생성/수정 폼​

9.7.1 폼 컴포넌트​

// frontend/src/components/PostForm.tsx
import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form';
import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
import { z } from 'zod';
import { Post } from '../types/post';

// Zod 스키마 정의
const postSchema = z.object({
  title: z
    .string()
    .min(3, '제목은 최소 3자 이상이어야 합니다')
    .max(100, '제목은 최대 100자까지 가능합니다'),
  content: z
    .string()
    .min(10, '내용은 최소 10자 이상이어야 합니다'),
  author: z
    .string()
    .min(1, '작성자는 필수입니다'),
  tags: z
    .array(z.string())
    .default([]),
  published: z
    .boolean()
    .default(false),
});

type PostFormData = z.infer<typeof postSchema>;

interface PostFormProps {
  post?: Post;
  onSubmit: (data: PostFormData) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
  isSubmitting?: boolean;
}

export const PostForm: React.FC<PostFormProps> = ({
  post,
  onSubmit,
  onCancel,
  isSubmitting = false,
}) => {
  const {
    register,
    handleSubmit,
    control,
    formState: { errors },
    setValue,
    watch,
  } = useForm<PostFormData>({
    resolver: zodResolver(postSchema),
    defaultValues: post || {
      title: '',
      content: '',
      author: '',
      tags: [],
      published: false,
    },
  });

  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = React.useState('');
  const tags = watch('tags');

  const handleAddTag = (e: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ',') {
      e.preventDefault();
      const trimmedTag = tagInput.trim();
      if (trimmedTag && !tags.includes(trimmedTag)) {
        setValue('tags', [...tags, trimmedTag]);
        setTagInput('');
      }
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagToRemove: string) => {
    setValue('tags', tags.filter(tag => tag !== tagToRemove));
  };

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-6">
      {/* 제목 */}
      <div>
        <label htmlFor="title" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
          제목 <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
        </label>
        <input
          id="title"
          type="text"
          {...register('title')}
          className={`w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 ${
            errors.title ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
          }`}
          placeholder="게시글 제목을 입력하세요"
        />
        {errors.title && (
          <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.title.message}</p>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* 작성자 */}
      <div>
        <label htmlFor="author" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
          작성자 <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
        </label>
        <input
          id="author"
          type="text"
          {...register('author')}
          className={`w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 ${
            errors.author ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
          }`}
          placeholder="작성자 이름을 입력하세요"
        />
        {errors.author && (
          <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.author.message}</p>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* 내용 */}
      <div>
        <label htmlFor="content" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
          내용 <span className="text-red-500">*</span>
        </label>
        <textarea
          id="content"
          rows={8}
          {...register('content')}
          className={`w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 ${
            errors.content ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-gray-300'
          }`}
          placeholder="게시글 내용을 입력하세요"
        />
        {errors.content && (
          <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.content.message}</p>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* 태그 */}
      <div>
        <label htmlFor="tags" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
          태그
        </label>
        <input
          id="tags"
          type="text"
          value={tagInput}
          onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
          onKeyDown={handleAddTag}
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"
          placeholder="태그를 입력하고 Enter를 누르세요"
        />
        {tags.length > 0 && (
          <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mt-2">
            {tags.map((tag, index) => (
              <span
                key={index}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-medium bg-blue-100 text-blue-800"
              >
                {tag}
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tag)}
                  className="ml-2 text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800"
                >
                  ×
                </button>
              </span>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>

      {/* 발행 여부 */}
      <div className="flex items-center">
        <input
          id="published"
          type="checkbox"
          {...register('published')}
          className="h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500 border-gray-300 rounded"
        />
        <label htmlFor="published" className="ml-2 block text-sm text-gray-900">
          게시글 발행
        </label>
      </div>

      {/* 버튼 */}
      <div className="flex justify-end gap-3">
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={onCancel}
          className="px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50"
          disabled={isSubmitting}
        >
          취소
        </button>
        <button
          type="submit"
          className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
          disabled={isSubmitting}
        >
          {isSubmitting ? '저장 중...' : post ? '수정' : '생성'}
        </button>
      </div>
    </form>
  );
};

9.7.2 모달 컴포넌트​

// frontend/src/components/Modal.tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
import { createPortal } from 'react-dom';

interface ModalProps {
  isOpen: boolean;
  onClose: () => void;
  title: string;
  children: React.ReactNode;
  size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl';
}

export const Modal: React.FC<ModalProps> = ({
  isOpen,
  onClose,
  title,
  children,
  size = 'md',
}) => {
  const modalRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleEscape = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        onClose();
      }
    };

    if (isOpen) {
      document.addEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    }

    return () => {
      document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
      document.body.style.overflow = 'unset';
    };
  }, [isOpen, onClose]);

  if (!isOpen) return null;

  const sizeClasses = {
    sm: 'max-w-md',
    md: 'max-w-2xl',
    lg: 'max-w-4xl',
    xl: 'max-w-6xl',
  };

  return createPortal(
    <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto">
      {/* 오버레이 */}
      <div
        className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 transition-opacity"
        onClick={onClose}
      />

      {/* 모달 */}
      <div className="flex min-h-full items-center justify-center p-4">
        <div
          ref={modalRef}
          className={`relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full ${sizeClasses[size]} transform transition-all`}
        >
          {/* 헤더 */}
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-6 py-4 border-b border-gray-200">
            <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900">{title}</h2>
            <button
              onClick={onClose}
              className="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 transition-colors"
            >
              <svg
                className="w-6 h-6"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                stroke="currentColor"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  strokeWidth={2}
                  d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
          </div>

          {/* 내용 */}
          <div className="px-6 py-4">{children}</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>,
    document.body
  );
};

9.7.3 폼을 사용한 페이지​

// frontend/src/pages/PostsPage.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { usePosts, useCreatePost, useUpdatePost, useDeletePost } from '../hooks/usePosts';
import { PostTable } from '../components/PostTable';
import { PostForm } from '../components/PostForm';
import { Modal } from '../components/Modal';
import { Post } from '../types/post';

export const PostsPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false);
  const [editingPost, setEditingPost] = useState<Post | null>(null);
  const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ page: 1, limit: 10 });

  const { data, isLoading } = usePosts(filters);
  const createPost = useCreatePost();
  const updatePost = useUpdatePost();
  const deletePost = useDeletePost();

  const handleCreate = () => {
    setEditingPost(null);
    setIsModalOpen(true);
  };

  const handleEdit = (post: Post) => {
    setEditingPost(post);
    setIsModalOpen(true);
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (formData: any) => {
    try {
      if (editingPost) {
        await updatePost.mutateAsync({ id: editingPost._id, data: formData });
      } else {
        await createPost.mutateAsync(formData);
      }
      setIsModalOpen(false);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Submit error:', error);
    }
  };

  const handleDelete = async (id: string) => {
    if (window.confirm('정말 삭제하시겠습니까?')) {
      await deletePost.mutateAsync(id);
    }
  };

  if (isLoading) {
    return <div className="flex justify-center items-center h-screen">로딩 중...</div>;
  }

  return (
    <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
      <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">게시글 관리</h1>
        <button
          onClick={handleCreate}
          className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
        >
          새 게시글
        </button>
      </div>

      <PostTable
        posts={data?.data || []}
        onEdit={handleEdit}
        onDelete={handleDelete}
      />

      <Modal
        isOpen={isModalOpen}
        onClose={() => setIsModalOpen(false)}
        title={editingPost ? '게시글 수정' : '새 게시글'}
      >
        <PostForm
          post={editingPost || undefined}
          onSubmit={handleSubmit}
          onCancel={() => setIsModalOpen(false)}
          isSubmitting={createPost.isPending || updatePost.isPending}
        />
      </Modal>
    </div>
  );
};

9.8 Frontend: 삭제 확인 다이얼로그​

9.8.1 확인 다이얼로그 컴포넌트​

// frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { createPortal } from 'react-dom';

interface ConfirmDialogProps {
  isOpen: boolean;
  title: string;
  message: string;
  confirmText?: string;
  cancelText?: string;
  confirmVariant?: 'danger' | 'primary';
  onConfirm: () => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
  isLoading?: boolean;
}

export const ConfirmDialog: React.FC<ConfirmDialogProps> = ({
  isOpen,
  title,
  message,
  confirmText = '확인',
  cancelText = '취소',
  confirmVariant = 'primary',
  onConfirm,
  onCancel,
  isLoading = false,
}) => {
  if (!isOpen) return null;

  const confirmButtonClass =
    confirmVariant === 'danger'
      ? 'bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white'
      : 'bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white';

  return createPortal(
    <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto">
      {/* 오버레이 */}
      <div
        className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 transition-opacity"
        onClick={onCancel}
      />

      {/* 다이얼로그 */}
      <div className="flex min-h-full items-center justify-center p-4">
        <div className="relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md transform transition-all">
          <div className="px-6 py-4">
            {/* 아이콘 */}
            <div className="flex items-center justify-center w-12 h-12 mx-auto mb-4 rounded-full bg-red-100">
              <svg
                className="w-6 h-6 text-red-600"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                stroke="currentColor"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  strokeWidth={2}
                  d="M12 9v2m0 4h.01m-6.938 4h13.856c1.54 0 2.502-1.667 1.732-3L13.732 4c-.77-1.333-2.694-1.333-3.464 0L3.34 16c-.77 1.333.192 3 1.732 3z"
                />
              </svg>
            </div>

            {/* 제목 */}
            <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 text-center mb-2">
              {title}
            </h3>

            {/* 메시지 */}
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 text-center mb-6">{message}</p>

            {/* 버튼 */}
            <div className="flex gap-3">
              <button
                onClick={onCancel}
                className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50"
                disabled={isLoading}
              >
                {cancelText}
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={onConfirm}
                className={`flex-1 px-4 py-2 rounded-md disabled:opacity-50 ${confirmButtonClass}`}
                disabled={isLoading}
              >
                {isLoading ? '처리 중...' : confirmText}
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>,
    document.body
  );
};

9.8.2 확인 다이얼로그 훅​

// frontend/src/hooks/useConfirm.ts
import { useState } from 'react';

interface ConfirmOptions {
  title: string;
  message: string;
  confirmText?: string;
  cancelText?: string;
  confirmVariant?: 'danger' | 'primary';
}

export const useConfirm = () => {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
  const [options, setOptions] = useState<ConfirmOptions>({
    title: '',
    message: '',
  });
  const [resolver, setResolver] = useState<{
    resolve: (value: boolean) => void;
  } | null>(null);

  const confirm = (opts: ConfirmOptions): Promise<boolean> => {
    setOptions(opts);
    setIsOpen(true);

    return new Promise<boolean>((resolve) => {
      setResolver({ resolve });
    });
  };

  const handleConfirm = () => {
    resolver?.resolve(true);
    setIsOpen(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    resolver?.resolve(false);
    setIsOpen(false);
  };

  return {
    confirm,
    isOpen,
    options,
    handleConfirm,
    handleCancel,
  };
};

9.8.3 사용 예제​

// frontend/src/pages/PostsPage.tsx (수정)
import React from 'react';
import { useConfirm } from '../hooks/useConfirm';
import { ConfirmDialog } from '../components/ConfirmDialog';
import { useDeletePost } from '../hooks/usePosts';

export const PostsPage: React.FC = () => {
  const { confirm, isOpen, options, handleConfirm, handleCancel } = useConfirm();
  const deletePost = useDeletePost();

  const handleDelete = async (id: string, title: string) => {
    const confirmed = await confirm({
      title: '게시글 삭제',
      message: `"${title}" 게시글을 정말 삭제하시겠습니까? 이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.`,
      confirmText: '삭제',
      cancelText: '취소',
      confirmVariant: 'danger',
    });

    if (confirmed) {
      await deletePost.mutateAsync(id);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div>
      {/* ... 기존 코드 ... */}

      <ConfirmDialog
        isOpen={isOpen}
        title={options.title}
        message={options.message}
        confirmText={options.confirmText}
        cancelText={options.cancelText}
        confirmVariant={options.confirmVariant}
        onConfirm={handleConfirm}
        onCancel={handleCancel}
        isLoading={deletePost.isPending}
      />
    </div>
  );
};

9.9 검색 기능 구현​

9.9.1 디바운스 훅​

// frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

export function useDebounce<T>(value: T, delay: number = 500): T {
  const [debouncedValue, setDebouncedValue] = useState<T>(value);

  useEffect(() => {
    const handler = setTimeout(() => {
      setDebouncedValue(value);
    }, delay);

    return () => {
      clearTimeout(handler);
    };
  }, [value, delay]);

  return debouncedValue;
}

9.9.2 검색 컴포넌트​

// frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useDebounce } from '../hooks/useDebounce';

interface SearchBarProps {
  onSearch: (query: string) => void;
  placeholder?: string;
  delay?: number;
}

export const SearchBar: React.FC<SearchBarProps> = ({
  onSearch,
  placeholder = '검색...',
  delay = 500,
}) => {
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const debouncedSearchTerm = useDebounce(searchTerm, delay);

  useEffect(() => {
    onSearch(debouncedSearchTerm);
  }, [debouncedSearchTerm, onSearch]);

  const handleClear = () => {
    setSearchTerm('');
  };

  return (
    <div className="relative">
      <div className="absolute inset-y-0 left-0 flex items-center pl-3 pointer-events-none">
        <svg
          className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-400"
          fill="none"
          viewBox="0 0 24 24"
          stroke="currentColor"
        >
          <path
            strokeLinecap="round"
            strokeLinejoin="round"
            strokeWidth={2}
            d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z"
          />
        </svg>
      </div>
      <input
        type="text"
        value={searchTerm}
        onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
        className="w-full pl-10 pr-10 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
        placeholder={placeholder}
      />
      {searchTerm && (
        <button
          onClick={handleClear}
          className="absolute inset-y-0 right-0 flex items-center pr-3"
        >
          <svg
            className="w-5 h-5 text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600"
            fill="none"
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            stroke="currentColor"
          >
            <path
              strokeLinecap="round"
              strokeLinejoin="round"
              strokeWidth={2}
              d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12"
            />
          </svg>
        </button>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

9.9.3 고급 검색 필터​

// frontend/src/components/PostFilters.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { SearchBar } from './SearchBar';
import { PostFilters as FilterType } from '../types/post';

interface PostFiltersProps {
  filters: FilterType;
  onFiltersChange: (filters: FilterType) => void;
  availableTags: string[];
}

export const PostFilters: React.FC<PostFiltersProps> = ({
  filters,
  onFiltersChange,
  availableTags,
}) => {
  const handleSearchChange = (search: string) => {
    onFiltersChange({ ...filters, search, page: 1 });
  };

  const handleTagChange = (tag: string) => {
    onFiltersChange({
      ...filters,
      tag: tag === filters.tag ? undefined : tag,
      page: 1,
    });
  };

  const handlePublishedChange = (value: string) => {
    onFiltersChange({
      ...filters,
      published: value === 'all' ? undefined : value === 'true',
      page: 1,
    });
  };

  const handleReset = () => {
    onFiltersChange({ page: 1, limit: 10 });
  };

  return (
    <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow mb-6 space-y-4">
      {/* 검색 */}
      <div>
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
          검색
        </label>
        <SearchBar
          onSearch={handleSearchChange}
          placeholder="제목 또는 내용으로 검색..."
        />
      </div>

      {/* 태그 필터 */}
      <div>
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
          태그
        </label>
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
          {availableTags.map((tag) => (
            <button
              key={tag}
              onClick={() => handleTagChange(tag)}
              className={`px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-medium transition-colors ${
                filters.tag === tag
                  ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white'
                  : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200'
              }`}
            >
              {tag}
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* 발행 상태 */}
      <div>
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
          상태
        </label>
        <div className="flex gap-2">
          <button
            onClick={() => handlePublishedChange('all')}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors ${
              filters.published === undefined
                ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white'
                : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200'
            }`}
          >
            전체
          </button>
          <button
            onClick={() => handlePublishedChange('true')}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors ${
              filters.published === true
                ? 'bg-green-600 text-white'
                : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200'
            }`}
          >
            발행됨
          </button>
          <button
            onClick={() => handlePublishedChange('false')}
            className={`px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors ${
              filters.published === false
                ? 'bg-gray-600 text-white'
                : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200'
            }`}
          >
            임시저장
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* 초기화 버튼 */}
      <div className="flex justify-end">
        <button
          onClick={handleReset}
          className="px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900"
        >
          필터 초기화
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};
검색 성능 최적화
  • 디바운스: 사용자 입력 후 일정 시간 대기 (300-500ms)
  • 캐싱: React Query로 검색 결과 캐싱
  • 백엔드 인덱싱: MongoDB 텍스트 인덱스 활용
  • 로딩 상태: 검색 중 스켈레톤 UI 표시

9.10 페이지네이션 UI​

9.10.1 페이지네이션 컴포넌트​

// frontend/src/components/Pagination.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { PaginationMeta } from '../types/post';

interface PaginationProps {
  pagination: PaginationMeta;
  onPageChange: (page: number) => void;
}

export const Pagination: React.FC<PaginationProps> = ({
  pagination,
  onPageChange,
}) => {
  const { page, totalPages, hasPrevPage, hasNextPage } = pagination;

  // 페이지 번호 배열 생성
  const getPageNumbers = () => {
    const pages: (number | string)[] = [];
    const maxVisible = 7; // 표시할 최대 페이지 수

    if (totalPages <= maxVisible) {
      // 전체 페이지가 적으면 모두 표시
      for (let i = 1; i <= totalPages; i++) {
        pages.push(i);
      }
    } else {
      // 많으면 생략 부호와 함께 표시
      if (page <= 3) {
        // 시작 부분
        for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
          pages.push(i);
        }
        pages.push('...');
        pages.push(totalPages);
      } else if (page >= totalPages - 2) {
        // 끝 부분
        pages.push(1);
        pages.push('...');
        for (let i = totalPages - 4; i <= totalPages; i++) {
          pages.push(i);
        }
      } else {
        // 중간 부분
        pages.push(1);
        pages.push('...');
        for (let i = page - 1; i <= page + 1; i++) {
          pages.push(i);
        }
        pages.push('...');
        pages.push(totalPages);
      }
    }

    return pages;
  };

  const pageNumbers = getPageNumbers();

  return (
    <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 sm:px-6">
      {/* 모바일 */}
      <div className="flex flex-1 justify-between sm:hidden">
        <button
          onClick={() => onPageChange(page - 1)}
          disabled={!hasPrevPage}
          className="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
        >
          이전
        </button>
        <button
          onClick={() => onPageChange(page + 1)}
          disabled={!hasNextPage}
          className="relative ml-3 inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
        >
          다음
        </button>
      </div>

      {/* 데스크톱 */}
      <div className="hidden sm:flex sm:flex-1 sm:items-center sm:justify-between">
        <div>
          <p className="text-sm text-gray-700">
            전체 <span className="font-medium">{pagination.total}</span>개 중{' '}
            <span className="font-medium">
              {(page - 1) * pagination.limit + 1}
            </span>{' '}
            -{' '}
            <span className="font-medium">
              {Math.min(page * pagination.limit, pagination.total)}
            </span>{' '}
            표시
          </p>
        </div>
        <div>
          <nav className="relative z-0 inline-flex rounded-md shadow-sm -space-x-px">
            {/* 이전 버튼 */}
            <button
              onClick={() => onPageChange(page - 1)}
              disabled={!hasPrevPage}
              className="relative inline-flex items-center px-2 py-2 rounded-l-md border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
            >
              <svg
                className="h-5 w-5"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                stroke="currentColor"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  strokeWidth={2}
                  d="M15 19l-7-7 7-7"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>

            {/* 페이지 번호 */}
            {pageNumbers.map((pageNum, index) => {
              if (pageNum === '...') {
                return (
                  <span
                    key={`ellipsis-${index}`}
                    className="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700"
                  >
                    ...
                  </span>
                );
              }

              return (
                <button
                  key={pageNum}
                  onClick={() => onPageChange(pageNum as number)}
                  className={`relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border text-sm font-medium ${
                    pageNum === page
                      ? 'z-10 bg-blue-600 border-blue-600 text-white'
                      : 'bg-white border-gray-300 text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50'
                  }`}
                >
                  {pageNum}
                </button>
              );
            })}

            {/* 다음 버튼 */}
            <button
              onClick={() => onPageChange(page + 1)}
              disabled={!hasNextPage}
              className="relative inline-flex items-center px-2 py-2 rounded-r-md border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
            >
              <svg
                className="h-5 w-5"
                fill="none"
                viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                stroke="currentColor"
              >
                <path
                  strokeLinecap="round"
                  strokeLinejoin="round"
                  strokeWidth={2}
                  d="M9 5l7 7-7 7"
                />
              </svg>
            </button>
          </nav>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// frontend/src/components/SortableTableHeader.tsx
import React from 'react';

type SortDirection = 'asc' | 'desc' | null;

interface SortableTableHeaderProps {
  label: string;
  field: string;
  currentSort: { field: string; direction: SortDirection };
  onSort: (field: string) => void;
}

export const SortableTableHeader: React.FC<SortableTableHeaderProps> = ({
  label,
  field,
  currentSort,
  onSort,
}) => {
  const isActive = currentSort.field === field;
  const direction = isActive ? currentSort.direction : null;

  return (
    <th
      onClick={() => onSort(field)}
      className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 select-none"
    >
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
        <span>{label}</span>
        <div className="flex flex-col">
          <svg
            className={`w-3 h-3 ${
              isActive && direction === 'asc'
                ? 'text-blue-600'
                : 'text-gray-400'
            }`}
            fill="currentColor"
            viewBox="0 0 20 20"
          >
            <path d="M5 10l5-5 5 5H5z" />
          </svg>
          <svg
            className={`w-3 h-3 -mt-1 ${
              isActive && direction === 'desc'
                ? 'text-blue-600'
                : 'text-gray-400'
            }`}
            fill="currentColor"
            viewBox="0 0 20 20"
          >
            <path d="M15 10l-5 5-5-5h10z" />
          </svg>
        </div>
      </div>
    </th>
  );
};

9.11.3 정렬 로직 훅​

// frontend/src/hooks/useSort.ts
import { useState } from 'react';

type SortDirection = 'asc' | 'desc';

interface SortState {
  field: string;
  direction: SortDirection;
}

export const useSort = (defaultField: string = 'createdAt', defaultDirection: SortDirection = 'desc') => {
  const [sort, setSort] = useState<SortState>({
    field: defaultField,
    direction: defaultDirection,
  });

  const handleSort = (field: string) => {
    setSort((prev) => {
      if (prev.field === field) {
        // 같은 필드 클릭 시 방향 전환
        return {
          field,
          direction: prev.direction === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc',
        };
      } else {
        // 다른 필드 클릭 시 내림차순으로 시작
        return {
          field,
          direction: 'desc',
        };
      }
    });
  };

  // API 요청용 문자열 (-field 형식)
  const getSortString = () => {
    return sort.direction === 'desc' ? `-${sort.field}` : sort.field;
  };

  return {
    sort,
    handleSort,
    getSortString,
  };
};

9.12 실시간 CRUD (Optimistic Updates)​

9.12.1 Optimistic Update 개념​

Optimistic Update는 서버 응답을 기다리지 않고 즉시 UI를 업데이트하여 빠른 사용자 경험을 제공하는 기법입니다.

// frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts (Optimistic Updates 추가)
import { useQueryClient, useMutation } from '@tanstack/react-query';

export const useCreatePostOptimistic = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: postsAPI.create,

    // Optimistic Update
    onMutate: async (newPost) => {
      // 진행 중인 쿼리 취소
      await queryClient.cancelQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });

      // 이전 데이터 백업
      const previousPosts = queryClient.getQueryData(['posts']);

      // 낙관적 업데이트: 임시 ID로 즉시 추가
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], (old: any) => {
        const tempPost = {
          ...newPost,
          _id: `temp-${Date.now()}`,
          createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
          updatedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
        };

        return {
          ...old,
          data: [tempPost, ...(old?.data || [])],
          pagination: {
            ...old?.pagination,
            total: (old?.pagination?.total || 0) + 1,
          },
        };
      });

      // 롤백을 위한 컨텍스트 반환
      return { previousPosts };
    },

    // 에러 발생 시 롤백
    onError: (err, newPost, context) => {
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], context?.previousPosts);
      toast.error('게시글 생성에 실패했습니다');
    },

    // 성공 시 서버 데이터로 교체
    onSuccess: (data) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      toast.success('게시글이 생성되었습니다');
    },
  });
};

export const useUpdatePostOptimistic = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: ({ id, data }: { id: string; data: Partial<Post> }) =>
      postsAPI.update(id, data),

    onMutate: async ({ id, data }) => {
      await queryClient.cancelQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      await queryClient.cancelQueries({ queryKey: ['posts', id] });

      const previousPosts = queryClient.getQueryData(['posts']);
      const previousPost = queryClient.getQueryData(['posts', id]);

      // 목록 업데이트
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], (old: any) => ({
        ...old,
        data: old?.data.map((post: Post) =>
          post._id === id
            ? { ...post, ...data, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() }
            : post
        ),
      }));

      // 단일 게시글 업데이트
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts', id], (old: any) => ({
        ...old,
        ...data,
        updatedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
      }));

      return { previousPosts, previousPost };
    },

    onError: (err, { id }, context) => {
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], context?.previousPosts);
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts', id], context?.previousPost);
      toast.error('게시글 수정에 실패했습니다');
    },

    onSuccess: (data, { id }) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts', id] });
      toast.success('게시글이 수정되었습니다');
    },
  });
};

export const useDeletePostOptimistic = () => {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();

  return useMutation({
    mutationFn: postsAPI.delete,

    onMutate: async (id) => {
      await queryClient.cancelQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });

      const previousPosts = queryClient.getQueryData(['posts']);

      // 목록에서 즉시 제거
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], (old: any) => ({
        ...old,
        data: old?.data.filter((post: Post) => post._id !== id),
        pagination: {
          ...old?.pagination,
          total: (old?.pagination?.total || 0) - 1,
        },
      }));

      return { previousPosts };
    },

    onError: (err, id, context) => {
      queryClient.setQueryData(['posts'], context?.previousPosts);
      toast.error('게시글 삭제에 실패했습니다');
    },

    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['posts'] });
      toast.success('게시글이 삭제되었습니다');
    },
  });
};

Optimistic Updates 장단점

장점:

  • 즉각적인 UI 반응으로 빠른 사용자 경험
  • 네트워크 지연 시간 체감 감소
  • 앱이 더 반응적으로 느껴짐

단점:

  • 에러 처리 복잡도 증가
  • 롤백 로직 필요
  • 일시적으로 잘못된 데이터 표시 가능

사용 권장 시나리오:

  • 실패 확률이 낮은 작업 (좋아요, 북마크 등)
  • 빠른 피드백이 중요한 UX
  • 오프라인 우선 앱

9.13 실습 문제: 블로그 시스템 구축​

문제​

다음 요구사항을 만족하는 완전한 블로그 CRUD 시스템을 구축하세요:

Backend 요구사항:

  1. Express + MongoDB를 사용한 RESTful API
  2. 게시글 CRUD 엔드포인트 (생성, 조회, 수정, 삭제)
  3. 검색 기능 (제목, 내용, 태그)
  4. 페이지네이션 (기본 10개, 최대 100개)
  5. 정렬 (최신순, 오래된순, 제목순)
  6. 유효성 검사 및 에러 처리

Frontend 요구사항:

  1. React + TypeScript + React Query
  2. 게시글 목록 페이지 (테이블 뷰)
  3. 게시글 생성/수정 폼 (모달)
  4. 삭제 확인 다이얼로그
  5. 검색바 (디바운스 적용)
  6. 페이지네이션 UI
  7. 정렬 옵션
  8. Optimistic Updates
해답

Backend 구현​

// backend/src/index.ts
import express from 'express';
import mongoose from 'mongoose';
import cors from 'cors';
import postRoutes from './routes/posts';
import { errorHandler } from './middleware/errorHandler';

const app = express();

// 미들웨어
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// 라우트
app.use('/api/posts', postRoutes);

// 에러 핸들러
app.use(errorHandler);

// MongoDB 연결
mongoose
  .connect('mongodb://localhost:27017/blog')
  .then(() => {
    console.log('MongoDB connected');
    app.listen(3000, () => {
      console.log('Server running on port 3000');
    });
  })
  .catch((err) => {
    console.error('MongoDB connection error:', err);
  });
// backend/src/routes/posts.ts
import express from 'express';
import { body, query, validationResult } from 'express-validator';
import { Post } from '../models/Post';
import { AppError } from '../middleware/errorHandler';
import mongoose from 'mongoose';

const router = express.Router();

// 유효성 검사 규칙
const createValidation = [
  body('title').trim().notEmpty().isLength({ min: 3, max: 100 }),
  body('content').trim().notEmpty().isLength({ min: 10 }),
  body('author').trim().notEmpty(),
  body('tags').optional().isArray(),
];

const queryValidation = [
  query('page').optional().isInt({ min: 1 }),
  query('limit').optional().isInt({ min: 1, max: 100 }),
  query('search').optional().isString(),
  query('tag').optional().isString(),
  query('sort').optional().isIn(['createdAt', '-createdAt', 'title', '-title']),
];

// 목록 조회
router.get('/', queryValidation, async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const errors = validationResult(req);
    if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효성 검사 실패', errors.array());
    }

    const page = parseInt(req.query.page as string) || 1;
    const limit = Math.min(parseInt(req.query.limit as string) || 10, 100);
    const search = req.query.search as string;
    const tag = req.query.tag as string;
    const sort = (req.query.sort as string) || '-createdAt';

    const filter: any = {};

    if (search) {
      filter.$or = [
        { title: { $regex: search, $options: 'i' } },
        { content: { $regex: search, $options: 'i' } },
      ];
    }

    if (tag) {
      filter.tags = tag;
    }

    const [posts, total] = await Promise.all([
      Post.find(filter)
        .sort(sort)
        .skip((page - 1) * limit)
        .limit(limit)
        .select('-__v'),
      Post.countDocuments(filter),
    ]);

    const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / limit);

    res.json({
      success: true,
      data: posts,
      pagination: {
        page,
        limit,
        total,
        totalPages,
        hasNextPage: page < totalPages,
        hasPrevPage: page > 1,
      },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

// 단일 조회
router.get('/:id', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 ID입니다');
    }

    const post = await Post.findById(id);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({ success: true, data: post });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

// 생성
router.post('/', createValidation, async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const errors = validationResult(req);
    if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효성 검사 실패', errors.array());
    }

    const post = await Post.create(req.body);

    res.status(201).json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 생성되었습니다',
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

// 수정
router.put('/:id', createValidation, async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 ID입니다');
    }

    const errors = validationResult(req);
    if (!errors.isEmpty()) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효성 검사 실패', errors.array());
    }

    const post = await Post.findByIdAndUpdate(
      id,
      { ...req.body, updatedAt: new Date() },
      { new: true, runValidators: true }
    );

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 수정되었습니다',
      data: post,
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

// 삭제
router.delete('/:id', async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { id } = req.params;

    if (!mongoose.Types.ObjectId.isValid(id)) {
      throw new AppError(400, '유효하지 않은 ID입니다');
    }

    const post = await Post.findByIdAndDelete(id);

    if (!post) {
      throw new AppError(404, '게시글을 찾을 수 없습니다');
    }

    res.json({
      success: true,
      message: '게시글이 삭제되었습니다',
      data: { id },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    throw error;
  }
});

export default router;

Frontend 구현​

// frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { usePosts, useCreatePost, useUpdatePost, useDeletePost } from '../hooks/usePosts';
import { PostTable } from '../components/PostTable';
import { PostForm } from '../components/PostForm';
import { Modal } from '../components/Modal';
import { ConfirmDialog } from '../components/ConfirmDialog';
import { SearchBar } from '../components/SearchBar';
import { Pagination } from '../components/Pagination';
import { SortSelect } from '../components/SortSelect';
import { useConfirm } from '../hooks/useConfirm';
import { PostFilters } from '../types/post';
import type { Post } from '../types/post';

const sortOptions = [
  { value: '-createdAt', label: '최신순' },
  { value: 'createdAt', label: '오래된순' },
  { value: 'title', label: '제목순 (A-Z)' },
  { value: '-title', label: '제목순 (Z-A)' },
];

export const BlogPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [filters, setFilters] = useState<PostFilters>({
    page: 1,
    limit: 10,
    search: '',
    sort: '-createdAt',
  });

  const [isFormOpen, setIsFormOpen] = useState(false);
  const [editingPost, setEditingPost] = useState<Post | null>(null);

  const { data, isLoading } = usePosts(filters);
  const createPost = useCreatePost();
  const updatePost = useUpdatePost();
  const deletePost = useDeletePost();

  const { confirm, isOpen, options, handleConfirm, handleCancel } = useConfirm();

  const handleSearch = (search: string) => {
    setFilters({ ...filters, search, page: 1 });
  };

  const handleSort = (sort: string) => {
    setFilters({ ...filters, sort, page: 1 });
  };

  const handlePageChange = (page: number) => {
    setFilters({ ...filters, page });
  };

  const handleCreate = () => {
    setEditingPost(null);
    setIsFormOpen(true);
  };

  const handleEdit = (post: Post) => {
    setEditingPost(post);
    setIsFormOpen(true);
  };

  const handleSubmit = async (formData: any) => {
    try {
      if (editingPost) {
        await updatePost.mutateAsync({ id: editingPost._id, data: formData });
      } else {
        await createPost.mutateAsync(formData);
      }
      setIsFormOpen(false);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Submit error:', error);
    }
  };

  const handleDelete = async (id: string, title: string) => {
    const confirmed = await confirm({
      title: '게시글 삭제',
      message: `"${title}" 게시글을 정말 삭제하시겠습니까?`,
      confirmText: '삭제',
      cancelText: '취소',
      confirmVariant: 'danger',
    });

    if (confirmed) {
      await deletePost.mutateAsync(id);
    }
  };

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div className="flex justify-center items-center h-screen">
        <div className="text-lg">로딩 중...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
      {/* 헤더 */}
      <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">블로그 관리</h1>
        <button
          onClick={handleCreate}
          className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700"
        >
          새 게시글
        </button>
      </div>

      {/* 검색 및 정렬 */}
      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 mb-6">
        <div className="flex-1">
          <SearchBar
            onSearch={handleSearch}
            placeholder="제목 또는 내용으로 검색..."
          />
        </div>
        <div>
          <SortSelect
            value={filters.sort || '-createdAt'}
            onChange={handleSort}
            options={sortOptions}
          />
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* 테이블 */}
      <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow mb-6">
        <PostTable
          posts={data?.data || []}
          onEdit={handleEdit}
          onDelete={(id) => {
            const post = data?.data.find((p) => p._id === id);
            if (post) {
              handleDelete(id, post.title);
            }
          }}
        />
      </div>

      {/* 페이지네이션 */}
      {data?.pagination && (
        <Pagination
          pagination={data.pagination}
          onPageChange={handlePageChange}
        />
      )}

      {/* 폼 모달 */}
      <Modal
        isOpen={isFormOpen}
        onClose={() => setIsFormOpen(false)}
        title={editingPost ? '게시글 수정' : '새 게시글'}
        size="lg"
      >
        <PostForm
          post={editingPost || undefined}
          onSubmit={handleSubmit}
          onCancel={() => setIsFormOpen(false)}
          isSubmitting={createPost.isPending || updatePost.isPending}
        />
      </Modal>

      {/* 삭제 확인 다이얼로그 */}
      <ConfirmDialog
        isOpen={isOpen}
        title={options.title}
        message={options.message}
        confirmText={options.confirmText}
        cancelText={options.cancelText}
        confirmVariant={options.confirmVariant}
        onConfirm={handleConfirm}
        onCancel={handleCancel}
        isLoading={deletePost.isPending}
      />
    </div>
  );
};
